"use strict";
OB_ready(OB_doWhenReady);

function OB_doWhenReady() {
    // localize everything
    var ooohBoi = window.ooohBoi || {};
    // local scope variables
    ooohBoi.prev_scroll_pos = window.scrollY || document.body.scrollTop;
    ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos;
    ooohBoi.scroll_direction = 'init';
    ooohBoi.prev_scroll_direction = 0;
    ooohBoi.header = document.querySelector('#show-hide-header'); // header ID
    ooohBoi.header_pos = {
        top: ooohBoi.header.offsetTop,
        left: ooohBoi.header.offsetLeft,
    };
    ooohBoi.header_height = OB_outerHeight(ooohBoi.header);
    // show-hide header with ease/transition
    ooohBoi.header.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease';
    // update header height on window resize
    ooohBoi.updateHeaderHeight = function() {
        ooohBoi.header_height = OB_outerHeight(ooohBoi.header);
    }
    // listen "scroll" event and decide what to do
    ooohBoi.checkScroll = function() {
        ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos = window.scrollY || document.body.scrollTop;

        if (ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos > ooohBoi.prev_scroll_pos) ooohBoi.scroll_direction = 'down';
        else if (ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos < ooohBoi.prev_scroll_pos) ooohBoi.scroll_direction = 'up';

        if (ooohBoi.scroll_direction !== ooohBoi.prev_scroll_direction) ooohBoi.toggleHeader(ooohBoi.scroll_direction, ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos);
        ooohBoi.prev_scroll_pos = ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos;
    }
    // add or remove class based on the scrolling direction
    ooohBoi.toggleHeader = function(scroll_direction, scroll_current) {
        if (scroll_direction === 'down' && scroll_current > ooohBoi.header_height) {
            OB_addClass(ooohBoi.header, 'im-hidden'); // for styling
            ooohBoi.header.style.top = -1 * ooohBoi.header_height + "px";
            ooohBoi.prev_scroll_direction = scroll_direction;
        } else if (scroll_direction === 'up') {
            OB_removeClass(ooohBoi.header, 'im-hidden');
            ooohBoi.header.style.top = ooohBoi.header_pos.top + "px";
            ooohBoi.prev_scroll_direction = scroll_direction;
        }
    }
    // listen "scroll" and "resize" window events
    window.addEventListener('scroll', ooohBoi.checkScroll);
    window.addEventListener('resize', ooohBoi.updateHeaderHeight);
}

function OB_outerHeight(el) {
    var height = el.offsetHeight;
    var style = getComputedStyle(el);
    height += parseInt(style.marginTop) + parseInt(style.marginBottom);
    return height;
}

function OB_addClass(el, className) {
    if (el.classList) el.classList.add(className);
    else {
        var current = el.className,
            found = false;
        var all = current.split(' ');
        for (var i = 0; i < all.length, !found; i++) found = all[i] === className;
        if (!found) {
            if (current === '') el.className = className;
            else el.className += ' ' + className;
        }
    }
}

function OB_removeClass(el, className) {
    if (el.classList) el.classList.remove(className);
    else el.className = el.className.replace(new RegExp('(^|\\b)' + className.split(' ').join('|') + '(\\b|$)', 'gi'), ' ');
}

function OB_ready(fn) {
    if (document.w3readyState != 'loading') fn();
    else if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', fn);
    else {
        document.attachEvent('onreadystatechange', function() {
            if (document.w3readyState != 'loading') fn();
        });
    }
}

									<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Getting into video production is a fast-paced industry. Imagine a year of growth where connecting with video creators is the key to success. It’s not just about meeting people—it’s about building meaningful relationships that can change your career.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Connecting with professionals in your industry opens doors to industry secrets, the latest techniques, and a wider professional network. Your social media can truly shine by creating video content that grabs attention, tells stories, and showcases your skills.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Being ahead means being where innovation happens. The top video production conferences in 2025 are more than just events—they’re platforms to learn about new tech, understand creative approaches, and meet industry leaders. These events also emphasize the </span><b>importance of video marketing</b><span style="font-weight: 400;">, enabling participants to integrate insights into their marketing strategies for improved communication and effective follow-ups.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">This is a journey of continuous learning and strategic connections. By investing in yourself and staying curious, you’ll go from being a good video professional to an exceptional one. The key is to seize growth opportunities, stay up to date, and consistently push your creative limits.</span></p>
<p><span style="font-weight: 400;">Your success in video production isn’t just about technical skills—it’s about relationships, staying informed, and being adaptable in an ever-changing digital world.</span></p>
<h2><b>Top 10 Videography Conferences 2025</b></h2>
<h3><b>1. Content Entrepreneur Expo</b></h3>
<p><b>Aug 24-26, 2025</b></p>
<p><b>Cleveland Ohio</b></p>
<p><a href="https://na.eventscloud.com/ereg/newreg.php?eventid=820977&utm_source=eventsitebutton&utm_medium=headerimage&_gl=1*14iveb7*_gcl_au*MTQ3MjUwMjkyNi4xNzMyNjAyODI2"><b>Price</b></a><span style="font-weight: 400;">:</span></p>
<p><b>All Access</b> <i><span style="font-weight: 400;">(includes pre-event workshop)</span></i><span style="font-weight: 400;"> $ 895.00</span></p>
<p><b>Conference Only </b><i><span style="font-weight: 400;">(NO pre-event workshop)</span></i><span style="font-weight: 400;"> $ 595.00</span></p>
<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter wp-image-36514 size-full" loading="lazy" src="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Content-Entrepreneur-Expo-2025.png" alt="Content Entrepreneur Expo 2025" width="1240" height="634" srcset="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Content-Entrepreneur-Expo-2025.png 1240w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Content-Entrepreneur-Expo-2025-300x153.png 300w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Content-Entrepreneur-Expo-2025-1024x524.png 1024w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Content-Entrepreneur-Expo-2025-768x393.png 768w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Content-Entrepreneur-Expo-2025-595xh.png 595w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 1240px) 100vw, 1240px" /></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><span data-color="transparent">Content creation has moved beyond just making content—it’s about building a sustainable independent career. Whether you’re a blogger sharing personal insights, a podcaster exploring exciting stories, an author writing compelling narratives, or a YouTuber creating videos and live streaming, there’s an event designed for your journey.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">A gathering where content entrepreneurs from all walks of life come together to learn, grow, and rebrand their digital strategies. This isn’t just another conference—it’s a total experience designed to help creators thrive independently without being held back by big tech platforms.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">The event will explore the latest strategies to help you build big audiences and generate actual revenue. Artificial intelligence isn’t just a buzzword here—it’s a tool you’ll learn to use effectively and change how you create and distribute content.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Networking isn’t just about swapping business cards; it’s about building meaningful relationships that can take your creative career to new levels. You’ll connect with fellow creators who get what it’s like to be a modern </span><a href="https://vidpros.com/how-to-be-a-content-creator-without-becoming-an-influencer/" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span data-color="transparent">content creator</span></a><span data-color="transparent">.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">There’s an opportunity for those who want to share their expertise: the Call for Speakers is open until December 1, 2024. This is your time if you have insights to inspire and educate your fellow creators. Decisions will be announced by January 24, 2025, so you’ll have a clear timeline for your speaking slot.</span></p>

<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter wp-image-36515 size-full" loading="lazy" src="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/OMR2025.png" alt="OMR2025" width="1243" height="632" srcset="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/OMR2025.png 1243w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/OMR2025-300x153.png 300w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/OMR2025-1024x521.png 1024w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/OMR2025-768x390.png 768w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/OMR2025-595xh.png 595w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 1243px) 100vw, 1243px" /></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><span data-color="transparent">Imagine a massive event that brings the digital world to life right in the heart of Hamburg. <p><span data-color="transparent">This isn’t your typical event. <p><strong><span data-color="transparent">The 2025 speaker lineup is looking good:</span></strong></p>

</li>
</ul>
<p><span data-color="transparent">This is more than a must attend event—it’s a roadmap to the future of the digital economy.</span></p>

<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">In a world where grabbing attention feels like fighting for air, the Australian media is a war zone of creativity and innovation. Mumbrella360 isn’t just a conference—it’s a strategic gathering for brands and marketers dealing with unprecedented technological disruption.</p>
<p>Marketing leaders will gather to share valuable insights on market trends, challenges, and opportunities in various sectors of media and digital marketing.</p>
<p>Two days of the best minds in marketing are coming together to crack the code. Over 100 speakers across ten content streams. This is about learning from the rebels, visionaries, and masters rewriting the rules of brand building.</p>
<p>This isn’t a typical conference. It’s a deep dive into the art and science of marketing, where global and local experts will show you how to stand out in a noisier world. Whether you’re a seasoned marketing professional or an ambitious newcomer, you’ll get unfiltered insights into creating brand experiences that stick.</p>

<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter wp-image-36517 size-full" loading="lazy" src="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Tubefest-2025.png" alt="Tubefest 2025" width="1239" height="543" srcset="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Tubefest-2025.png 1239w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Tubefest-2025-300x131.png 300w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Tubefest-2025-1024x449.png 1024w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Tubefest-2025-768x337.png 768w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Tubefest-2025-595xh.png 595w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 1239px) 100vw, 1239px" /></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">Forget the myth of overnight success—Tubefest is where serious content creators and businesses learn the fundamental strategies for digital growth. This isn’t just another conference; it’s a comprehensive roadmap to turning your video content into a revenue-generating machine.</p>
<p>Whether you’re a YouTuber or a business looking to transform your marketing, Tubefest will show you practical and proven strategies for success. Imagine learning from creators who’ve already turned their passions into full-time careers, with insights beyond tips and into real-world, actionable how-to’s.</p>
<p>Video editors attending the event will have the opportunity to enhance their skills in software tools like Final Cut Pro and other production techniques, emphasizing both technical training and industry networking.</p>
<p>The event will go deep on content monetization, audience engagement, and brand partnerships that will change your approach to digital marketing. You’ll learn how to create content and build a sustainable, profitable brand that stands out in a noisy digital world.</p>
<p><strong>The 2025 speaker lineup brings serious cred:</strong></p>

</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Oisín Mulligan </strong>| Fitness expert with no-nonsense practical advice</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Ashleigh Watson </strong>| Social media consulting powerhouse</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>Whether you want to grow your audience, secure brand deals, or completely transform your marketing strategy, Tubefest will give you the necessary tools and connections.</p>

<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter wp-image-36520 size-full" loading="lazy" src="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Atomicon-2025.png" alt="Atomicon 2025" width="1238" height="578" srcset="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Atomicon-2025.png 1238w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Atomicon-2025-300x140.png 300w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Atomicon-2025-1024x478.png 1024w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Atomicon-2025-768x359.png 768w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Atomicon-2025-595xh.png 595w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 1238px) 100vw, 1238px" /></p>

<p><span data-color="transparent">This is a pitch-free zone where real learning happens—no salesy nonsense, no expensive products, just pure, actionable insights to help you grow. The whole experience is designed to do one thing: help you.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">With multiple tracks, you can customize your learning experience to make every session relevant and valuable. Plus, all sessions will be professionally recorded, so you won’t miss a thing if you can’t attend every moment live.</span></p>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">The 2025 speaker lineup brings serious inspiration:</span></strong></p>

</li>

</li>

</li>
</ul>
<p><span data-color="transparent">What makes ATOMICON different? It’s not about making you feel inadequate—it’s about giving you new skills, fresh ideas, valuable connections, and, most importantly, absolute confidence to grow your business.</span></p>

<h2>Mastering Video Production Conferences for Video Professionals: Your Cheat Sheet</h2>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Conferences are more than just events – they’re opportunities to level up your career. Here’s how to make the most of every minute:</span></p>
<h3><strong><span data-color="transparent">Conference Preparation</span></strong></h3>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Plan smart.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Research sessions that fit your goals.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Learn first.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Keynotes, panels, and hands-on workshops.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Network like a pro.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Prepare a short introduction.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Use body language to look approachable.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Follow up with new contacts quickly.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Use social media hashtags to connect with more people.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Make the most of it</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Take strategic breaks.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Use technology to take notes.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Engage in discussions.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Be open to surprises.</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3><strong><span data-color="transparent">Post-Conference Action Plan</span></strong></h3>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Summarise the key takeaways.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Identify actions.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Create a detailed plan.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Share with your team.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Get feedback and test new ideas.</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<h3><strong><span data-color="transparent">Networking Basics</span></strong></h3>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Send follow-up emails quickly.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Connect on LinkedIn with a personal message.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Share industry-relevant content.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Suggest follow-up meetings with promising contacts.</span></p>
</li>
</ul>

        left: ooohBoi.header.offsetLeft,
    };
    ooohBoi.header_height = OB_outerHeight(ooohBoi.header);
    // show-hide header with ease/transition
    ooohBoi.header.style.transition = 'all 0.3s ease';
    // update header height on window resize
    ooohBoi.updateHeaderHeight = function() {
        ooohBoi.header_height = OB_outerHeight(ooohBoi.header);
    }
    // listen "scroll" event and decide what to do
    ooohBoi.checkScroll = function() {
        ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos = window.scrollY || document.body.scrollTop;

        if (ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos > ooohBoi.prev_scroll_pos) ooohBoi.scroll_direction = 'down';
        else if (ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos < ooohBoi.prev_scroll_pos) ooohBoi.scroll_direction = 'up';

        if (ooohBoi.scroll_direction !== ooohBoi.prev_scroll_direction) ooohBoi.toggleHeader(ooohBoi.scroll_direction, ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos);
        ooohBoi.prev_scroll_pos = ooohBoi.cur_scroll_pos;
    }
    // add or remove class based on the scrolling direction
    ooohBoi.toggleHeader = function(scroll_direction, scroll_current) {
        if (scroll_direction === 'down' && scroll_current > ooohBoi.header_height) {
            OB_addClass(ooohBoi.header, 'im-hidden'); // for styling
            ooohBoi.header.style.top = -1 * ooohBoi.header_height + "px";
            ooohBoi.prev_scroll_direction = scroll_direction;
        } else if (scroll_direction === 'up') {
            OB_removeClass(ooohBoi.header, 'im-hidden');
            ooohBoi.header.style.top = ooohBoi.header_pos.top + "px";
            ooohBoi.prev_scroll_direction = scroll_direction;
        }
    }
    // listen "scroll" and "resize" window events
    window.addEventListener('scroll', ooohBoi.checkScroll);
    window.addEventListener('resize', ooohBoi.updateHeaderHeight);
}

function OB_outerHeight(el) {
    var height = el.offsetHeight;
    var style = getComputedStyle(el);
    height += parseInt(style.marginTop) + parseInt(style.marginBottom);
    return height;
}

function OB_addClass(el, className) {
    if (el.classList) el.classList.add(className);
    else {
        var current = el.className,
            found = false;
        var all = current.split(' ');
        for (var i = 0; i < all.length, !found; i++) found = all[i] === className;
        if (!found) {
            if (current === '') el.className = className;
            else el.className += ' ' + className;
        }
    }
}

function OB_removeClass(el, className) {
    if (el.classList) el.classList.remove(className);
    else el.className = el.className.replace(new RegExp('(^|\\b)' + className.split(' ').join('|') + '(\\b|$)', 'gi'), ' ');
}

function OB_ready(fn) {
    if (document.w3readyState != 'loading') fn();
    else if (document.addEventListener) document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', fn);
    else {
        document.attachEvent('onreadystatechange', function() {
            if (document.w3readyState != 'loading') fn();
        });
    }
}
</script>				</div>

						<div data-bglz=1 class="elementor-widget-container">
							<div data-bglz=1 data-elementor-type="wp-post" data-elementor-id="20435" class="elementor elementor-20435" data-elementor-post-type="post">
				<div data-bglz=1 class="elementor-element elementor-element-73ef8cb5 e-flex e-con-boxed e-con e-parent" data-id="73ef8cb5" data-element_type="container">

				<div data-bglz=1 class="elementor-element elementor-element-28e375f9 elementor-widget elementor-widget-text-editor" data-id="28e375f9" data-element_type="widget" data-widget_type="text-editor.default">
						<div data-bglz=1 class="elementor-widget-container">
									<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []">The numbers tell an exciting story: the creator economy is set to nearly double from $250 billion to $480 billion by 2027. This massive growth means real opportunities for both new and established social media influencers.</p>
<p>To succeed in this fast-moving field, content creators need to keep their skills sharp, especially in video editing. As social media platforms constantly change their features and trends, staying current is essential. This is where conferences come in.</p>
<h2>Why attend video editing conferences in 2025?</h2>
<p>Attending these events in 2025 can give you a real edge in several ways, including the opportunity to acquire industry insights that can enhance your content creation and effective video marketing initiatives.</p>
<p>First, you’ll learn practical skills you can use right away. Through hands-on workshops and training sessions, you’ll pick up new techniques that will make your content stand out. Instead of struggling to figure things out independently, you’ll learn directly from expert video editors with the latest tools and tricks.</p>
<p>Second, you’ll meet people who could help shape your career. Whether it’s other creators who want to collaborate, industry experts who can offer guidance, fellow video professionals, or potential clients looking for talent, your connections at these conferences can open new doors.</p>
<p>The bottom line? As video content continues to dominate social media, investing time in these conferences isn’t just about learning new editing skills – it’s about positioning yourself for success in a growing industry.</p>
<p>For anyone serious about making it as a content creator, these events offer valuable knowledge and connections that can help take your work to the next level.</p>
<h2><span data-color="transparent">14 Video Editing Conferences You Must Attend in 2025</span></h2>
<h3>1. Creator Economy Live</h3>
<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter wp-image-36467 size-full" loading="lazy" src="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/Creator-Economy-Live-2025.png" alt="Creator Economy Live 2025" width="1252" height="629" /></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>Date: February 4-5, 2025</strong></p>
<p><strong>Caesars Forum, Las Vegas</strong></p>
<p><a href="https://creatoreconomylive.com/register?utm_source=cel25&utm_medium=qualifiedoffer&utm_campaign=pb2" rel="noopener noreferrer">Price</a>:</p>
<p><strong>All Access Pass:</strong> Full Price $999</p>
<p><strong>VIP Pass:</strong> Full Price $1,040</p>
<p>Are you looking to get ahead in social media and content creation? Creator Economy Live is considered one of the best video production conferences, bringing together the brightest minds in the industry for an influential annual event. This conference is where creators, brands, and influencers unite to share what works today.</p>
<p><em>“I’ve been to many industry events, but Creator Economy Live stands above the rest for social media and influencer marketing professionals,”</em> says Yevgeniy Malyarchuk, Social Media Director at New Pacific Airline.</p>
<p>Whether you’re a content creator looking to grow your audience, a brand seeking to connect with influencers, or someone curious about the latest <a href="https://vidpros.com/best-video-editing-for-social-media/" rel="noopener noreferrer">video editing trends</a>, this event delivers real value. You’ll get hands-on experience with new tools, learn strategies that work, and, most importantly, connect with people who can help take your career to the next level.</p>
<p>The conference offers practical sessions on creating standout content, direct access to advertisers looking for fresh talent, and plenty of chances to build relationships with others in the field. Plus, you’ll learn cutting-edge video editing techniques that can help your content catch attention in crowded social feeds.</p>
<p>Think of it as your one-stop shop for everything you need to succeed in today’s creator economy – from learning new skills to making valuable connections that could lead to your next ample opportunity.</p>
<h3><span data-color="transparent">2. DMWF Asia 2025</span></h3>
<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter wp-image-36468 size-full" loading="lazy" src="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/DMWF-2025.png" alt="DMWF 2025" width="1244" height="532" srcset="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/DMWF-2025.png 1244w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/DMWF-2025-300x128.png 300w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/DMWF-2025-1024x438.png 1024w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/DMWF-2025-768x328.png 768w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/DMWF-2025-595xh.png 595w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 1244px) 100vw, 1244px" /></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>Date: February 26-27, 2025</strong></p>
<p><strong>Marina Bay Sands Singapore</strong></p>
<p><a href="https://tickets.digitalmarketing-conference.com/asia-imw-2025/register" rel="noopener noreferrer">Price</a>:</p>
<p><strong>Two Days All-Access Pass</strong> | Platinum Advanced – Save 40% until 28 November $539</p>
<p><strong>Day 1 Conference Pass</strong> | Platinum Advanced – Save 40% until 28 November $509</p>
<p><strong>Day 2 Conference Pass</strong> | Platinum Advanced – Save 40% until 28 November $509</p>
<p>Are you looking to stay ahead in digital marketing? DMWF Asia brings together the brightest minds to explore what’s working now – and what’s coming next. This conference covers all the essential tools of modern marketing, from creating engaging content and understanding data to making the most of <a href="https://vidpros.com/brand-influencer-partnerships-gone-wrong-lessons-learned/" rel="noopener noreferrer">influencer partnerships</a> and e-commerce. Plus, you’ll learn practical ways to use AI and Web3 without breaking the bank.</p>
<p>Think of it as your chance to put your brand in the spotlight. You’ll share the stage with industry leaders and get your message in front of marketing professionals from across Asia and beyond. Whether launching something new or looking to strengthen your market position, DMWF Asia gives you the platform to shine.</p>
<p><strong>Industry Leaders Speaking at DMWF Asia 2025:</strong></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong>Aseem Puri</strong> | CEO of Unilever International</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Low Ngai Yuen </strong>| Chief Merchandise & Marketing Officer AEON (M) Co Berhad</p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong>Diana Boo</strong> | Chief Marketing Officer Boost</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>This event is a must-attend for CMOs and marketing leaders looking to stay ahead in digital marketing.</p>
<h3><span data-color="transparent">3. SXSW (South by Southwest)</span></h3>
<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter wp-image-36469 size-full" loading="lazy" src="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/SXSW-2025.png" alt="SXSW 2025" width="1265" height="541" srcset="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/SXSW-2025.png 1265w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/SXSW-2025-300x128.png 300w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/SXSW-2025-1024x438.png 1024w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/SXSW-2025-768x328.png 768w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/SXSW-2025-595xh.png 595w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 1265px) 100vw, 1265px" /></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong><span data-color="transparent">Date: March 7-15, 2025</span></strong></p>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Austin, TX</span></strong></p>
<p><a href="https://www.sxsw.com/attend/" rel="noopener noreferrer"><span data-color="transparent"><u>Price</u></span></a><span data-color="transparent">:</span></p>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Platinum Badge</span></strong><span data-color="transparent"> | $1895 | Walk-up Rate $2295</span></p>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Interactive Badge</span></strong><span data-color="transparent"> |$1395 | Walk-up Rate $1695</span></p>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Film & TV Badge</span></strong><span data-color="transparent"> | $1195 | Walk-up Rate $1395</span></p>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Music Badge</span></strong><span data-color="transparent"> | $795 | Walk-up Rate $995</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Take the most exciting developments in film, music, technology, and media, put them all in one place, and add innovative thinkers and creative pioneers. That’s </span><em><span data-color="transparent">SXSW (South by Southwest)</span></em><span data-color="transparent"> in a nutshell—an annual festival that has become a must-attend event for anyone passionate about where culture and technology meet.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">The SXSW Conference sits at the heart of it all, offering 22 unique tracks that span the creative spectrum. Something here will catch your eye whether you’re into filmmaking, music production, or cutting-edge tech.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">What makes SXSW unique is how it looks to the future. Take the 2050 track, for example. Here, you’ll dive into big ideas that could shape our world:</span></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Quantum computing breakthroughs.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">The next frontier of space exploration.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Advances in robotics.</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Forward-thinking strategies that help us anticipate what’s coming next.</span></p>
</li>
</ul>
<p><span data-color="transparent">The magic of SXSW lies in its ability to bring together creative minds from every field, sparking new ideas and collaborations. It’s where artists meet tech innovators, filmmakers connect with musicians, and significant cultural shifts often begin to take shape.</span></p>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Featured Speakers for SXSW 2025:</span></strong></p>
<ul>
<li>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Amy Webb</span></strong><span data-color="transparent"> | CEO of Future Today Institute</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Johanna Faries</span></strong><span data-color="transparent">, President Blizzard Entertainment</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Dr. Peter Atia</span></strong><span data-color="transparent"> | Founder & CEO of Early Medical</span></p>
</li>
<li>
<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Douglas Rushkoff </span></strong><span data-color="transparent">| Author & Podcast Host</span></p>
</li>

<p><strong><span data-color="transparent">Laurie Santos</span></strong><span data-color="transparent"> | Professor of Psychology Yale University</span></p>

</ul>
<h3>4. NAB Show for Post Production Professionals</h3>
<p><img loading="lazy" decoding="async" class="aligncenter wp-image-36470 size-full" loading="lazy" src="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/NabShow-2025.png" alt="NabShow 2025" width="1137" height="620" srcset="https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/NabShow-2025.png 1137w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/NabShow-2025-300x164.png 300w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/NabShow-2025-1024x558.png 1024w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/NabShow-2025-768x419.png 768w, https://vidpros.com/wp-content/uploads/2024/11/NabShow-2025-595xh.png 595w" sizes="auto, (max-width: 1137px) 100vw, 1137px" /></p>
<p data-pm-slice="1 1 []"><strong>Date: April 6-9, 2025</strong></p>
<p><strong>Las Vegas, NV</strong></p>
<p>Price: TBA <em>(Registration will open in mid-January 2025)</em></p>
<p>Imagine the biggest names in media, entertainment, and technology all in one place. That’s the NAB Show – the premier gathering where industry professionals come to discover what’s next in video and content creation.</p>
<p>The NAB Show is also known for its extensive Post Production World, offering a wide range of training opportunities and workshops for professionals.</p>
<p>Check this out:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>46,000 decision-makers exploring the latest innovations.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Connecting with industry pioneers.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Getting hands-on experience with cutting-edge tools.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>Whether you’re looking to master new <a href="https://vidpros.com/the-top-10-video-editing-techniques-courses-bonus-resources/" rel="noopener noreferrer">video editing techniques</a> or stay ahead of industry trends, NAB Show delivers practical knowledge you can use immediately.</p>
<p>Why wait to level up your skills? While some might hesitate, staying on the sidelines could mean missing out on valuable opportunities to grow your business and enhance your craft. NAB Show allows you to learn from experts, try new technology firsthand, and build relationships that could shape your future success.</p>
<p>The event typically offers a rich mix of learning experiences:</p>
<ul>
<li>
<p>Expert-led keynote presentations.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Real-world insights from successful content creators.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Interactive panel discussions.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Hands-on workshops.</p>
</li>
<li>
<p>Extensive exhibit halls featuring the latest technology.</p>
</li>
</ul>
<p>While the speaker lineup for NAB Show 2025 has yet to be announced, the event has a strong track record of bringing together influential voices who shape our industry’s future.</p>

<h2>The Future of Video Editing is Here: Industry Trends</h2>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Video editing is changing quickly. Two significant changes are leading the way: artificial intelligence is making editing simpler, while virtual reality is making editing more hands-on and interactive.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Many professionals attend conferences to keep up with these fast changes. These events are like large gatherings where video experts share new ideas, the latest technology, tips and tricks, and success stories.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">Think of these conferences as learning festivals. You get to see and leverage technology tools, learn from experienced editors, meet others who share your passion for video, and stay ahead of industry changes.</span></p>
<p><span data-color="transparent">If you want to improve video editing, these conferences can help. They’re great places to learn what’s new and connect with other video creators.</span></p>
<p><em><span data-color="transparent">What conferences have you enjoyed before? Which ones coming up in 2025 interest you most? We’d love to hear your thoughts!</span></em></p>								</div>

<style id='wp-block-template-skip-link-inline-css'>

		.skip-link.screen-reader-text {
			border: 0;
			clip-path: inset(50%);
			height: 1px;
			margin: -1px;
			overflow: hidden;
			padding: 0;
			position: absolute !important;
			width: 1px;
			word-wrap: normal !important;
		}

		.skip-link.screen-reader-text:focus {
			background-color: #eee;
			clip-path: none;
			color: #444;
			display: block;
			font-size: 1em;
			height: auto;
			left: 5px;
			line-height: normal;
			padding: 15px 23px 14px;
			text-decoration: none;
			top: 5px;
			width: auto;
			z-index: 100000;
		}
</style>

<script>
	document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', function() {
		var wrapper = document.querySelector('.vimeo-wrapper');
		if (wrapper) {
			var observer = new IntersectionObserver(function(entries) {
				if (entries[0].isIntersecting) {
					var videoId = wrapper.getAttribute('data-video-id');
					var iframe = document.createElement('iframe');
					iframe.src = "https://player.vimeo.com/video/" + videoId + "?background=1&autoplay=1&loop=1&byline=0&title=0";
					iframe.frameBorder = "0";
					iframe.allow = "autoplay; fullscreen";
					iframe.allowFullscreen = true;
					wrapper.appendChild(iframe);

					var placeholder = wrapper.querySelector('.video-placeholder');
					if (placeholder) {
						wrapper.removeChild(placeholder);
					}

					observer.unobserve(wrapper);
				}
			}, {
				threshold: 0.1
			});
			observer.observe(wrapper);
		}
	});
</script>

</section>

		// Early exit if a skip-link target can't be located.
		if ( ! skipLinkTarget ) {

		/*

		sibling = document.querySelector( '.wp-site-blocks' );

		// Early exit if the root element was not found.
		if ( ! sibling ) {
			return;

		// Get the skip-link target's ID, and generate one if it doesn't exist.
		skipLinkTargetID = skipLinkTarget.id;
		if ( ! skipLinkTargetID ) {
			skipLinkTargetID = 'wp--skip-link--target';
			skipLinkTarget.id = skipLinkTargetID;
		}

		skipLink = document.createElement( 'a' );

		skipLink.id = 'wp-skip-link';
		skipLink.href = '#' + skipLinkTargetID;
		skipLink.innerText = 'Skip to content';

		// Inject the skip link.
		sibling.parentElement.insertBefore( skipLink, sibling );
	}() );

Top 10 Broadcast and Media Trade Shows and Conferences to Attend in 2024
Author

Published on

1/17/2024

Moments Lab Content Team
Contents
Text Link
Searching your videos is a pain?

With MXT it doesn't have to be.

Book a discovery call
Share
Insights

8 min read

Top 10 Broadcast and Media Trade Shows and Conferences to Attend in 2024

The last 12 months saw some incredible innovations come out of the broadcast and media industries, and there’s no doubt more to come in 2024. What better place to make new business connections and witness cutting-edge media and entertainment technology than on the trade show circuit? 

We've put together a list of what we consider the must-visit global broadcast industry trade shows and conferences for you to attend in 2024.

1. Silicon Valley Video Summit

Date: January 23, 2024

Location: Mountain View, CA

Why go: Presented by Sports Video Group, the Silicon Valley Video Summit (SVVS) is a must-attend event for both key industry players and up-and-coming tech companies. Focusing on how big tech companies are embracing new video technology, the summit is an exciting, buzzing exchange of broadcast and big tech thought leadership. 

Moments Lab co-founder and CEO Philippe Petitpont spoke on the key panel – AI for Video Production & Post - Today! Catch the replay here.

‍

2. NAB Show Las Vegas

Dates: April 13-17, 2024

Location: Las Vegas, NV

Why go: NAB Las Vegas is arguably the most famous trade show in the media and broadcast industry’s annual event calendar, and for good reason! A hotbed of innovation, last year’s show alone welcomed more than 1000 broadcast, media, and technology companies to showcase their expertise. It also attracted 65,000+ visitors from over 160 countries, making it a truly global event. 

During the show, companies demonstrate their vision for the future of the media and broadcast industry and the content lifecycle. Anyone who is anyone will be there! 

Be among the first to demo Moments Lab's next-gen MXT-1.5 AI at booth SL2113 - pick a meeting time.

Register for NAB Show show here.

‍

‍

3. MPTS

Dates: May 15-16, 2024

Location: London, UK

Why go: The Media Production and Technology Show (MPTS) is the UK’s largest event for the media and broadcast industries, exploring both the creative side of content production and the technological innovations that make this happen. If you’re looking for a bustling event in the heart of London, hosting a range of demos and free educational seminars, head down to Olympia London on May 15th and 16th. 

Be sure to stop by to see Moments Lab’s latest product developments at the show -find us at booth T4!

Find out more.

‍

4. CABSAT 

Dates: May 21-23, 2024

Location: Dubai World Trade Centre, UAE

Why go: It’s CABSAT’s 30th anniversary year! The event was first held three decades  ago to highlight the latest trends and technologies in the media and satellite communications industry in the Middle East, Africa and Southern Asia regions. Boasting a range of exciting speaking and networking opportunities — including workshops, panel discussions, product demos, and a prestigious awards program — it’s no wonder media professionals from over 100 countries gather here annually.

Get more details here.

‍

5. ATxSG

Dates: May 29-31, 2024

Location: Singapore

Why go: Held over four days, Asia Tech x Singapore is one of the APAC region’s flagship events for the digital media and broadcasting industries. This year’s show will once again  host a wealth of co-located events, enabling participants to network and keep their finger on the pulse of the latest tech trends, challenges, solutions, and opportunities. If you’re interested in how media and broadcasting intersect with society and the digital economy, keep your eyes peeled on the official event site for more details!

Check it out.

‍

6. SET EXPO

Dates: August 19-22, 2024

Location: São Paulo, Brazil

Why go: SET EXPO is Latin America’s largest broadcast and new media event, where more than 400 local and international companies gather each year to showcase their expertise through product exhibitions and presentations. Attend for the opportunity to present and discuss technical innovations, business trends, regulations, and new products across the entire production chain, from creation to delivery.

Learn more.

‍

7. IBC Show

Dates: September 13-16, 2024

Location: Amsterdam, NL

Why go: With last year’s event attracting a crowd of over 43,000, it’s clear that the IBC Show is truly back in business! As Europe’s main hub for media, technology, and broadcast innovation, IBC brings together business leaders and tech pioneers from across the globe. Sporting a mix of bustling exhibitor booths, networking, speaking events, and awards ceremonies, the show has something for everyone! 

Read the recap of our 2023 show presentation about using Gen AI in multiplatform video publishing.

Visit Moments Lab at IBC2024, stand 5.H60. 

Register for IBC Show here.

    

‍

8. NAB Show NY

Date: October 8-10, 2024

Location New York

Why go: NAB New York is the media trade show to attend if you’re wanting to get a look at the latest industry offerings, but on the East Coast of the United States. The show welcomes thousands of professionals to exhibit and rub shoulders with movers and shakers from major broadcast networks, film and TV studios, and production and post-production houses. Known to stimulate engaging, peer-to-peer conversations, the event is a much more intimate gathering than its sister show in Las Vegas.

Head to this site for more details.

‍‍

9. FIAT IFTA World Conference

Date: October 15-18 2024

Location: Bucharest, Romania

Why go: After four years away, the FIAT/IFTA World Conference returned to Europe in 2023 with Locarno as the host city. We can’t wait for the 2024 event in Bucharest! If you’re an expert working in media archiving, on all things metadata, or you’re interested in the latest audiovisual technologies and trends including AI, this is the conference for you.

‍

Get your head around the role of AI in archiving and data management.

Register for the 2024 World Conference here.

‍

‍‍

10. NewsTECHForum

Dates: December 17, 2024 

Location: Presented by TVNewsCheck, this annual conference in New York gives you the opportunity to meet news, technology, digital executives and managers from station groups across the U.S.A. NewsTECHForum is co-located with the popular Sports Video Group Summit, so you can hit two conferences in one day!

Watch our co-founder and CEO Philippe Petitpont below on the 2023 panel, Harvesting the Archive for New Content and Opportunities alongside Devon Armijo, Director of Digital News Integration at Hearst Television, Mike Palmer, AVP, Advanced Technology/Media Management at Sinclair Broadcast Group and Ben Ramos, VP, Fox Archive, Field and Emerging Tech, at Fox News.

Find out more about NewsTECHForum.

That's our 2024 broadcast and media trade shows list for you!

‍Follow us on LinkedIn to stay in the know about other key industry events, and tell us which ones you'll be attending.

    <script type="text/javascript">
        /** Akamai service time */
        var akamaiServerTimePath = 'https://time.akamai.com';

        /** set servertime defaults here for reject and resolve cases */
        window.northstar = window.northstar || {};
        window.northstar.servertime = {};
        window.northstar.servertime.enabled = true;
        window.northstar.servertime.failed = false;

        // Add the param to test servertime
        var searchParams = new URLSearchParams(window.location.search);
        var possibleDate = parseInt(searchParams.get('servertime'), 10) || 0;
        var isServerTimeParam = possibleDate > 0;

        if (isServerTimeParam) {
            /** this is the way we are making the response available for State to pick up */
            var epoch = possibleDate;

            window.northstar = window.northstar || {};
            window.northstar.servertime = {
                dateFormat: null,
                epoch: epoch,
                currentTime: (function (epoch, pageLandingTime) {
                    var timeMachine = function(epoch, pageLandingTime) {
                        var epochClosure = epoch,
                            pageLandingTimeClosure = pageLandingTime;

                        // Instance stores a reference to the Singleton
                        let instance;

                        function init(epoch, pageLandingTime) {
                            // private
                            let initialTime = epoch || Date.now();

                            return {
                                initialTime,
                                getTime() {
                                    return Date.now() - pageLandingTime + epoch;
                                },
                            };
                        }

                        return {
                            getInstance() {
                                if (!instance) {
                                    instance = init(epochClosure, pageLandingTimeClosure)
                                }
                                return instance;
                            }
                        };
                    };
                    return timeMachine(epoch, pageLandingTime);
                })(epoch, Date.now())
            }

            /** notify to state and other components to get servertime */
            window.dispatchEvent(new Event('northstar:serverTime'));
        }

        if (!isServerTimeParam) {
            /* If Akamai does not responde by 3 secs, terminate request */
            var servertimeTimeoutPromise = new Promise(function (res, rej) {
                setTimeout(rej, 3000, 'servertime timeout')
            });

            /* add a race to Servertime Called or a one second timer */
            var raceAkamaiPromises = Promise.race([ fetch(akamaiServerTimePath), servertimeTimeoutPromise ]);

            raceAkamaiPromises
                .then(function(res) {
                    /* get reponse headers */
                    var dateFromHeaders = res && res.headers && res.headers.get
                        ? res.headers.get('Date')
                        : null;

                    if (dateFromHeaders) {
                        var epoch = Date.parse(dateFromHeaders);
                        /** this is the way we are making the response avaialbe for State to pick up */
                        window.northstar = window.northstar || {};
                        window.northstar.servertime = {
                            dateFormat: dateFromHeaders,
                            epoch: epoch,
                            currentTime: (function (epoch, pageLandingTime) {
                                var timeMachine = function(epoch, pageLandingTime) {
                                    var epochClosure = epoch,
                                        pageLandingTimeClosure = pageLandingTime;

                                    // Instance stores a reference to the Singleton
                                    let instance;

                                    function init(epoch, pageLandingTime) {
                                        // private
                                        let initialTime = epoch || Date.now();

                                        return {
                                            initialTime,
                                            getTime() {
                                                return Date.now() - pageLandingTime + epoch;
                                            },
                                        };
                                    }

                                    return {
                                        getInstance() {
                                            if (!instance) {
                                                instance = init(epochClosure, pageLandingTimeClosure)
                                            }
                                            return instance;
                                        }
                                    };
                                };
                                return timeMachine(epoch, pageLandingTime);
                            })(epoch, Date.now())
                        }
                    }
                    /** notify to state and other components to get servertime */
                    window.dispatchEvent(new Event('northstar:serverTime'));
                })
                .catch(function() {
                    /** notify failure and release state / components from waiting */
                    window.northstar.servertime.failed = true;
                    window.dispatchEvent(new Event('northstar:serverTime'));
                });
        }
    </script>

								let lazyloadBackground = entry.target;
								if( lazyloadBackground ) {

					lazyloadBackgrounds.forEach( ( lazyloadBackground ) => {
